overview:
Business Strategy Professional and Startup Junkee with 8 years of experience in small business development, direct B2C sales, B2B sales, web commerce, fund raising, business model development, and strategy implementation. Possesses a strong analytical skill set mixed with a broad range of startup and international experience that is leveraged to develop sustainable growth in businesses.

Experience includes: -Strategy consulting for high-tech, high-growth ventures at the Missouri Innovation Center (business incubator) in all aspects of funding, get-to-market, competitive analysis, financials, and execution -International Marketing experience while working in mainland China -Assisting Spearhead Technologies through early development and growth into a profitable company -Strategy and Development of FullContactOutlet.com, a web commerce and direct sales business -Direct Sales and Sales Management at Vector Marketing Corporation
